original_text: But Martha was thinking to herself, ‘I cannot do all this work alone.’ So she went to Jesus. She said, ‘Master, my sister is not helping me with the work. She has left me to do it alone. You surely do not think that this is right! Tell her that she should help me!’
korean_text: 마르다는 준비하는 일이 많아 마음이 분주한지라 예수께 나아가 이르되 주여 내 동생이 나 혼자 일하게 두는 것을 생각하지 아니하시나이까 그를 명하사 나를 도와 주라 하소서

sentences.original_text: But Martha was thinking to herself
'I cannot do all this work alone.'
sentences.korean_translation: '나는 이 모든 일을 혼자서 할 수 없어요.'

sentences.original_text: 'my sister is not helping me with the work.'
'She has left me to do it alone.'
'You surely do not think that this is right!'
'Tell her that she should help me!'
